mapper.select: select id, activityId, userId, viewTime from activity_view_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into activity_view_history (id, activityId, userId, viewTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewtime,jdbcType=BIGINT})
